scenario_text.value:
Looks like she’s still conscious. That’s
good, but she’s wounded from head to toe...

He’s hurt, but it don’t look too bad. You
good? Can you get outta here?

Don’t push yourself. Here, take this. It’s
just a hanky, but...

I’ll make a tourniquet around the wound so it
won’t open.
Thanks, this is a big help...

We’re gathering up all the injured. You
should come with us.
I hope Jijimon and the others are okay...
